name: Social Standing
description: Proficiencies related to your status within spacefaring culture in all its forms.
You have a license to own and operate military grade weaponry and can legally purchase such items without any difficulty.

name: Concentration
description: Proficiencies that help with maintaining concentration even in the face of distractions.
You are capable of holding the same thing in mind even when sitting in an uncomfortable position or after skipping a meal.
You can maintain your concentration even if outside in winter without a coat or in the middle of a fight.
You can maintain your concentration even when suffering crippling injuries or while on mind-altering substances.
